website_summaries.verdict: A brightly lit star projector with plenty of options that also works as a night-light.
pros: Combine and choose from multiple lighting colors
Has an auto-shutoff timer from 5 to 95 minutes
The unit rotates and can be used as a night-light
It also works via easy-to-use button controls
cons: Some users would have preferred it to be more durable

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly really awesome. The only downside I can see is the black globe is really thin and I cracked it when I tripped over the cord in the dark. It still works fine, but not sure how durable it would be if my baby were able to grab at it. (The glowing light in the picture is a different product we use for sound, it doesn't project starts in case that was confusing)
customer_reviews.author: kcm

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY! BREAKS QUICKLY!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I was asked if a replacement product would be okay, I said okay but I haven't heard a response in over a week.... Bought this a month ago, my daughter loved it and now all of a sudden it doesn't spin. I would never recommend this to anyone that expects more than a few months life expectancy out of it. I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fun for adult couple.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, soecial, sensual, romantic...yes all this. Bought to add more color and textured lighting to bedroom. The pics im posting are stars in blue mode but my camera is brightening the picture and making them look more purple than blue. Pros: super cheap, beautiful. My man LOVES it. Gets up in the middle of the night to reset the timer. Thats my main complaint...does it NEED to be on a timer? Also, it is a little flimsy. The outer dome doesnt click firmly into the lamp. But i dont use it anyway. I keep it off to project the stars. Oh...another con, its not strong enough to show up if the overhead light is on.
customer_reviews.author: Artsyzeal

customer_reviews.title: defective? only one working button...
customer_reviews.text: The C button worked properly and switched between the different light settings. All of the other buttons were faulty and did not work as described. The LCD display flickered non-stop like a strobe light and I couldn't see how much time was set because only fragments of the numbers were displayed. The rotary switch (B button) and the night light (D button) did not work at all. Overall, the product seemed easy to use but the majority of its features did not work.
customer_reviews.author: andy neutron

customer_reviews.title: Biggest piece of crap - ever
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this thing has so many positive reviews... I bought this for my nephew as a Christmas gift, and I am so glad I tried it out before I gave him nothing but disappointment and shattered dreams. First, it didn't work with batteries or an adaptor; it had to be hooked up to a computer to even "function". Second, the "stars" were so blurry they were basically just blobs floating around on the ceiling - no matter how close it was to the ceiling. Third, it kept falling apart every time you touched it. The best thing about it was the broken English on the box.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few days
customer_reviews.text: This sky star sky lamp only worked for about 3 days. We would turn it on and set the timer for 30 minutes. It isn’t worth the 1.5 hrs of use we got out of it. My son was highly disappointed when it just stopped working. I noticed it was going to stop working when only the white light would work and it would only stay on for about 30 seconds. Now it doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy Sky Night
customer_reviews.text: I'm confused why others thought this lamp was so great. In fact, I bought it based on the reviews I read. I returned it, because the images were so fuzzy, no matter what height I set the lamp at.
customer_reviews.author: MamaW

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, flimsy, junk
customer_reviews.text: This is the smallest piece of junk. It doesn’t even come with the plug part to connect the UBS to an outlet. Luckily I had an extra from an old phone charger. The stars project blurry, which I kind of anticipated. But the biggest dissapointment was the star film, which is exactly that - a flimsy piece of projector film - will definitely not hold us to any sort of use. Bent it just trying to get the dome cover off. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: S. Choma

customer_reviews.title: Changed my mind love it now
customer_reviews.text: Not as bright and striking as I thought it would be. Maybe it's the type of ceiling I have. I tried it up against the corner also and same result. Edit: changed my mind, love this thing. It actually does light up almost my entire ceiling and my room is kinda big.
customer_reviews.author: NightCrawler

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and essential part of bedtime. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this item. We bought it for her nursery a year before she ended up using it. We had an issue and customer service resolved it promptly. It's lightweight and has a timer which makes it easy to be efficient. It helps lull her to sleep with its awesome colors. It's a part of our bedtime routine every night. Will be buying another if we ever have another little one. As I stated, customer service solved out problem in 24 hours so I will absolutely give this company future business.
customer_reviews.author: Enlelisa

customer_reviews.title: Best stars ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Live these stars! Ordered them for my 5 abd 7 year old and my 16 year old got jealous. Between the not needing batteries, having a timer to automatically go off, and the ability to choose any combination of colorful stars, what's not to love. Would order one for every kiddo I know if I could. Thankfully they do have the battery option becaise I know these will go camping with us in our rv.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Best night light for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old daughter who's obsessed with stars. It comes with a USB cord, instructions and the light. The instructions are very clear on what each button is for. The cover is easy to pop off for the illumination of the stars. Our favorite part is the timer, I can leave it on just long enough for my daughter to enjoy the lights til she dozes off no worries about the light running all night. My daughter loves the fact that she can pick the color for the lights to display in and the rotation of the lights is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Johnsons

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining but flimsy quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids to watch before bedtime since my toddlee girl recently became interested in stars and the moon. Pros: Different variety of color and pattern combinations, easy to use, timer for auto shut off. Cons: Cheap quality and plastic, easily damaged. Word of advice: don't let your young children play with it, the dome under the plastic cover is very flimsy and can cave in. Wish this also came with music or soothing sounds, that would have been a plus!
customer_reviews.author: jenerationmama

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs/Fuses Burn Out Quickly - Not Replaceable
customer_reviews.text: We received a similar toy for our son, and due to its popularity, decided to purchase this for our daughter (10/30/2018). The blue bulb or fuse has already burned out. Plus, the noise it makes during the rotation mode is quite noticeable. We love the timer feature and different colors. Overall, this product helped greatly with the transition from crib to toddler bed. However, it's unfortunate that this product wore out so very fast and that the bulbs/fuses are not easily replacement, which I just learned from reading the user Q&A :( . I was hoping to learn how buy/replace that blue bulb!
customer_reviews.author: geekGRLOH

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I love this so much! I use it every night! This would be great for children, my young nephews love using it. As someone who can't sleep in the dark, I use this daily and it projects across the whole room. It makes it easier to sleep and I love the stars. It has red, blue, green lights with another button to add white lights by itself or with the rest of the colours, the timer can be set up to 95 minutes and then it turns off. It also makes a little noise, for others it might be discomforting but for me it actually helps me fall asleep (sounds a little like a vague a/c).
customer_reviews.author: Ter

customer_reviews.title: ***UPDATE REVIEW*** broke after 8 month
customer_reviews.text: ***Original review*** After 8 month of use, white smoke started coming out from the lights and broke... I am buying the new one because my kids like it and they were so sad when it broke... trying to search on a new star projector with different brand and company now:( ***Update review*** Great customer service! I like how this company take all customer's negative review seriously and they send me a new one! I am happy when my kids are happy looking at colorful stars and moon! Hopefully it won't break again! Please!!!:)
customer_reviews.author: Miya

customer_reviews.title: Crap, not good for kids, overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this projector. For one, the part with the stars is too easy to remove. My 21-month-old is constantly pulling it off. There should be an easy locking mehanism rather than just a simple twist since this is marketed for kids. Second, it’s not very bright and the stars look dull. His room is not very big and even in pitch black, anything on the ceiling (especially the moon) is blurred. Third, there aren’t nearly as many stars and moons as in the advertisement. Its pretty lame. And fourth, the countdown timer is way too bright. It’s just way overpriced for a crappy product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayli S.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk..
customer_reviews.text: Remember at the fair when you threw that ring around something and the guy with missing teeth gave you a prize? Well, that prize he gave you was twice as good as this lamp. It’s a piece of junk. You have to hook it up to your laptop and HAVE IT ON AND OPEN. I was so disappointed. I’m trying to find the $20.00 bill that has to been hidden inside because this this is worth about $5.00.
customer_reviews.author: Aulorenzo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing, since the lights on the ceiling were very blurry.
customer_reviews.author: di318

customer_reviews.title: It’s so cool.
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. I gave it to my 10 yr old dtr for her birthday. It works wonderfully. She received it in November and has used it every night since. I love that there is a timer and a cord. She uses the battery though. It always looks so cool when she puts it on. She offers to let me use it in my room because I love it so much. This week though she said the green light was kinda dull. So I need to check out if I can change the bulbs. Even that would not deter me from buying it again. I think it’s a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Overall super cool light, but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this light and enjoys the stars every night. The first time I ordered this item, came with no power cord. The replacement was fast. This item is less than two months old, and the motor started making this super loud noise that doesn't stop. Now, instead of using the moving stars, we can only use the lights. The spinning motor started spinning faster than the other gears, so overall, the item doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Widalys

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors with projection stars and moon.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited to give this to my daughter for Christmas. I opened the box to test it out and I just love it. The colors are bright and cycle through purple, blue, green, yellow, red, orange, or you can select plain white. You can also select rotation or stationary position. There is also a timer feature that you can set it to turn off after the desired time, up to 99 minutes. I know my daughter will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Oregonian Amazonians

customer_reviews.title: 10000% amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This nightlight is amazing and my daughter is obsessed. It’s great that you can put the colored lights and the white lights on at the same time. When the colored lights timer turns off, the white lights stay on making it a constant night light with rotating stars.
customer_reviews.author: CnD917

customer_reviews.title: Really Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It’s so cheaply made that I’m sure it could be easily broken - just super cheap plastic - but the lights are beautiful. I am 60 years old and purchased it because I have difficulty falling asleep at night. I had tried everything I could think of, and then it hit me one night how I used to love to fall asleep under the lights of the Christmas Tree as a child. I found this, decided to try it, and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only one year, but I'm reordering
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why my current one broke after a year. I really like this thing and I think my kid does too. But if this only lasts another single year, I'll probably find a different, higher quality version. Also not thrilled that the USB doesn't include an A/C adapter. But, if you're looking for a planetarium to see if it's your kid's thing and aren't picky about accuracy of constellations, give this a try. Hard to go wrong at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light to use on my model train layout. The attached picture was taken during the day and I was unable to seal out all of the outside light, yet it was sufficiently bright. I did purchase an inexpensive external power supply at my local Walmart. I am very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Horton

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works all night
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kids as a cool night light. Every other kid one, especially the popular ones, has a timer and no option to just leave it on. This one allows them to leave it on ass night. They love changing the color combos. There are a ton to choose from. The only thing that I wish was better was the star cover should be harder. It’s pretty thin and my boys have already crinkled it. On the plus side, it didn’t break or crack when they messed with it.
customer_reviews.author: tjlawson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little night light for your child
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little night light for your child. It shows up beautifully on your ceiling and the timer is great. This is smaller than I thought it would be, but works fine so it doesn’t bother me. I’m giving it 4 starts because I don’t like that it requires batteries, I wish I could plug it into an outlet. This only allows you to plug it into a USB.
customer_reviews.author: Judie trent

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, terrible product! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this product! Product was really cool and projected bright pretty stars on the ceiling when it worked! The first one I got worked for a week, then suddenly all the lights quit working. Tried replacing the batteries, no luck. Returned it, got a second one, it worked for 2 days and quit working. Returning the second one and will not get another one. Super bummed because my daughter loved it when it worked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This is actually our second one just like this. The first one broke within less than a month of using it. Now this one has been used less than 6 months and the only color that lights up is red. The others went out long ago. Sometimes it rotates. Sometimes it doesn’t. Sometimes the buttons start performing the wrong functions...for example the button that is supposed to make it rotate would instead change the color. Everything was so intermittent and now we just have an expensive red night light.
customer_reviews.author: H. Stice

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I work with visually impaired preschoolers and I was looking for a light to turn on for naptime for the few students who don't fall asleep to look at. My students love watching lights on our black classroom walls. Based on the pictures, I thought this light would be great! I turned it on with the classroom lights on, took the cover off, and it was not bright enough. I was so disappointed. I don't know if it was just mine that malfunctioned, because the other pictures looked like it would work perfectly! The lights that showed up on the wall were all distorted and not bright. I unfortunately returned it to purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Nice for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I think overall this projector is good. The plastic cover that projects the light isn't made very well and can crack if not careful. The projector itself is very durable, and has a bright light. The timer feature is nice, but there is not a remote. The overall shape of the stars and moons are nice, but a bit blurry on the ceiling. This is a good one for kids though.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: So much fun even for an adult!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my house because my three year old niece has one and I just thought it was so cool that I thought I’d get one for myself. It’s just soooooo much fun for an item this price! The first night I bought it I put on my sound machine/had stars on the ceiling and seriously fell asleep so happy and slept better than I had in months! It’s just so fun! I wish the stars were a little more on focus on the ceiling but for under $30 it’s a great item!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Furr

customer_reviews.title: Solar system
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. I didn’t gift this to a baby but my sons. I did their entire room in a solar system theme and I saw this and had to have it. Super easy to operate and they love it. It’s bright and shuts off when you need it to!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nursery
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this light. I bought it for my infant to entertain him in his crib (and maybe buy myself a few more minutes of sleep) and it does exactly what I need. It works great as a night light with the cover do we can see without being too bright to keep him awake. The stars are bright enough to see, but also not too bright to keep him awake. I do wish I had the option of making each color or combination of colors blink and not just the last option of ever color, but other than that I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Obsessed

customer_reviews.title: Very vivid colors, instructions are pretty weak
customer_reviews.text: This is a great star light for our kids room. They really enjoy it. The colors are really vivid. They just opened it so I can't speak to the longevity of it. The instructions are pretty weak but a little playing and it's pretty easy to figure out what each button does. Edit: It seems Amazon compressed the video so much that it destroyed most of it. There are still a few bits that give a decent recent idea what it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: M. Prindle

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: Lots of color options, runs on a timer up to 95 minutes long, the stars are kinda blurry because they are printed on the plastic dome that rotates, instead of being cut out. The controls take a little bit of trial and error to figure out what they all do. It doesn’t come with a cord, but you can use an android phone charger instead of using batteries. My kid won’t go to sleep without it. Overall great product, used it for 6 months with no problems. If it ever breaks I’ll buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T

customer_reviews.title: Really nice stars
customer_reviews.text: This projector is really neat. I like how you can put the stars on the wall. It also changes color and you can choose between it rotating or it not rotating. It also has a timer which is nice. You also have the option of adding the white light inside as well to make it a little bit brighter. I know my kids will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Angello

customer_reviews.title: Good...BUT...
customer_reviews.text: The light part is good and pretty and really cool. However... We bought so that when our child woke up in the middle of the night she could watch stars. Turns out it has a 95 minute timer and then auto shutoff. No way around it. So that was annoying. Also the buttons are extremely loud and we turn it on when she is sleeping sometimes and it sounds like tiny hammers. You have to push the button 20 times to get up to 95 minutes of playtime. Really not a week thought out interface.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Mecham

customer_reviews.title: A great gift item!
customer_reviews.text: This night lamp is beautiful with a lot of different time and pattern light modes. It was a gift for my 5 year old nephew whose birthday theme was outer space and this was an appropriate add on gift item. Along with the kids at home, my husband loves the night lamp and keeps it at the longest time mode which I think is 99 minutes. When turned on, the room is filled with rotating patterns of stars and moon. Its a really mesmerizing feeling and feel like one is sleeping under the stars. I highly recommend this night lamp for kids and adults bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it secretly so do I
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old baby is always staring at the ceiling so I decided to buy this for her to turn on when it’s bed time. She loves it and stairs at the ceiling watching it the entire time until she falls asleep. It has a timer on it to set for how ever many minutes you would like. It does NOT get hot at all which is great. You can change the colors of the stars and moon and you can have it spin or not spin. It covers the entire ceiling but it’s not a sharp picture more like a kids coloring on the wall but it’s still amazing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FOR ALL AGES
customer_reviews.text: WE BOUGHT THIS FOR OUR PRECIOUS GRANDDAUGHTER. AT FIRST WE COULDN'T FIGURE IT OUT BECAUSE THE COVER IS HARD TO TAKE OFF. HOWEVER, ONCE YOU REMOVE THE COVER IT IS AWESOME! A DEAR FRIEND RECOMMENDED IT AND WE'VE SHARED WITH OTHERS HOW WONDERFUL IT IS! OK SO WE JUST BOUGHT ANOTHER ONE AS A GIFT FOR A FRIEND'S TWO LITTLE ONES AND THEY LOVE IT💗 IT'S THE COOLEST ITEM. YOU WILL LOVE IT⚘⚘⚘A REALLY AWESOME ITEM.....⚘⚘⚘
customer_reviews.author: kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and is beautiful to see the stars and moon projections on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and is beautiful to see the stars and moon projections on the walls and ceiling of the small bedroom. My 4 year old grandson loved it. And I love how I can easily set the timer to have the projection go for a certain length of time before shutting down. I set the timer to go off after he would be well asleep. It evens fascinates me to see the colored stars and moon being projected! I like the fact that I can have the stars and moon all one color or change it to many colors!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome projector!
customer_reviews.text: This projector is awesome! My son loves it. He goes to sleep with it on every night since he got it on Christmas. There are multiple colors to choose from, including a few color combos. You can set the timer up 99 minutes. You an choose rotate or stationary. It'll run on batteries or you can plug it in with the included usb cord. I highly recommend this to every mom! Your kids will me thrilled to watch the stars across their bedroom walls and ceiling every night. I've entertained multiple small kids at once with it. My son's friend loved it so much that his mom bought him one too :)
customer_reviews.author: Venuswolf

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: First, you need a USB plug for this so know that. Second you need to remove the cover nightly for use. Seems some people didn’t get that and thinks it’s dim. This lights up my children’s room nicely. They have fun choosing which color or combination each night. This can be spinning or still. Easy to use, small enough to bring on road trips or in our RV. Easy timer. No complaints. We have one and gave one as a shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: It works, but the quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: From the moment you pull this light out of it’s packaging you realize that it’s a flimsy, cheaply made piece of plastic that will soon adorn the recycling bin. Every time you touch it something falls off. I’m considering superglue on this unit just to keep all the pieces together until the inevitable disintegration. Oh and “motor” sounds like remote controlled car at top speed. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: P. Merson

customer_reviews.title: The different colors and settings are really nice, especially the timer
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and half year old daughter really likes her lamp! The different colors and settings are really nice, especially the timer, so I don’t have to go in there and turn it off! The only suggestion would be to maybe put it somewhere where your toddler can’t reach!! I put it on the floor and I always find my daughter messing with the settings or taking cap off and on! Overall highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pascarella

customer_reviews.title: Great night light.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light for my kids to fall asleep with, but to not stay on all night. They love this light. They choose the colors and we made it brighter and made the stars clearer by taking off the top part of the globe. You can take the stars liner off and just have the lights if you want it even brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids room!!! Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a kid room night light. Works well, batteries last about 2-3 weeks when used every night on the 30 min timer. Only thing about this set up is that when the batteries are almost dead the turning device begins to make a sound. Overall good purchase though, satisfied with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Basic but mostly a let down. Probably worth 7 or 8 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok but any Starr’s more than 2-3 feet from the item are so blurred they just look like spots. So that would be any stars that would be on the ceiling. Also the timer goes up but not down. You have to cycle through 90 minutes in 5 minute increment to go from 10 minutes to 5.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I had some doubts about the product when it first arrived. It is very delicate when it comes to the star cut out, however, it does come with a protector. Overall, it ended up being more than I expected. My daughter loves it, not dim at all and the built in timer is perfect! I truly am in love with this nightlight!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Curiel

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, which is sad because when it works, it's great
customer_reviews.text: Got this on Prime Day. Yesterday, after a week, it started making sounds as it turns, as if it is laboring. Like a growling cat. Also, the green light died. So, I can't use the rotating feature and I have no green light. It fills the room with stars, circles and one huge quarter moon per color, but clearly the quality is shoddy. Look elsewhere. I'm not going to bother returning it because I got it for $15, but buyer beware!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: akitachow

customer_reviews.title: They could easily break the cover rendering it useless
customer_reviews.text: The product is cheaply made and flimsy so don't let kids handle or operate it. They could easily break the cover rendering it useless. We use this in a small room and the stars are pretty blurry. I like that it has a timer so I don't have to remember to shut it off. Overall, I'm glad I purchased it but it really shouldn't cost more than $15.
customer_reviews.author: jennythomas76

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. My son is 8 months and has a small room and this lamp is the perfect brightness. “Turning on the stars” has become an important part of our bedtime routine and he enjoys watching the rotating lights as he nurses and goes to sleep. I like that you can also make the lights stationary and the timer feature is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Malea Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted us about 6 months. The timer shuts off early and lights are flickering. This is with it being plugged in, not battery.
customer_reviews.author: KRABO

customer_reviews.title: Nice projector, but maybe not the best nightlight
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son as a fun nightlight. It works great, you can pick the colors, choose rotation, and set a timer. However, we found it too stimulating and ultimately had to remove it from the bedroom for bedtime due to sleep issues. It is now a fun toy that we play with when awake. I would just say it probably depends on how your kid does at bedtime in determining whether this would be appropriate as a nightlight.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Little bit blurry ,Projection could be better
customer_reviews.text: It is simple to use , material is also not bad but not very strong either . I have only one suggestion or complain that projection light is not so strong so if you keep in on bed or side table then effects on ceiling becomes blurry , if you hold the light and make it nearer to ceiling you will see good and clear images but definitly no one can hold it like this : ) which also narrows the area of projection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: When you get this item it looks like a happy meal toy just made out of very cheap plastic i was avoiding paying for the $40 one but it’s well worth it this one broke two days later the plastic was so Cheap
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Magallanes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ceiling entertainment!! Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter-well for both of my daughters!! Who are over the age of 18 they both love night lights and this is perfect for them instead of leaving the tv on all night. Only or should I say slight issue is the timer! They say they wish it would stay on all night but it doesn't matter to me as long as they're happy then I'm happy!!! They are kinda lightweight but that doesn't have an effect on the star'y lights!!!
customer_reviews.author: BreReader

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for a child fearful of the dark
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s room since he is scared of the dark and he absolutely loves it. My son is 6 and has no problem using this. The animations come with different color options, the ability to rotate and somewhat of an alarm that will automatically shut it on. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: annette brown

customer_reviews.title: Good product without the noise from the rotation
customer_reviews.text: We had bought this same light 3 years ago, the rotation broke after my 2 year old dropped it. I had no hesitation placing an order for a new one. We started using the new one with the rotating stars function. A couple days later, I kept looking around my sons room for a new noise I heard. Come to find out the new star machine makes a noise when it rotates now from the gears or whatever. It is very annoying and my son can’t fall asleep with it on. We will try to exchange it to see if it’s just a bad one we got.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic!!!!! I wanted moving stars on my ceiling, preferably with a sleep timer, and this item is just right. It makes a small sound, but I use a sound spa, so it doesn't bother me at all. Unless you need absolute quiet, it will not bother you. It comes with a cap so it can be used without the stars, but I didn't need that part. I'm grown and LOVE this sky lamp - pretty sure a kid would. In a child's room, just be careful not to place it in an area where it may get bumped - the plug comes out very easily.
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: Lid comes off. Cheap quality. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I used it maybe for 10-12 times. But the lid that rotates came off. It’s made of very thin and poor quality plastic. Although the lights are bright and nice, but the poor quality lid comes off and ruins it. Also the timer buttons are poorly made. It worked fine for 5-6 times but after that I had to really push the buttons hard to get the settings right. Overall its a cheap quality product and not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old Loves this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: My 4 year old just loves to lay on his back, listen to music and stare up at the stars dancing along the ceiling. Cons: The stars are not all perfectly clear if projected at a distance, but my child could care less! The top screen that has star cut outs is very fragile and comes off easily, so be careful when a child handles it!
customer_reviews.author: roya

customer_reviews.title: great price and works just like it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my partner who loves solar space and staying up late to play music. We live in the city so we can’t see the stars, but now he can! Just remember to take the top part off if you want to use it to see the stars and not just as a night light.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these. One for each grandkid and a spare to keep at my house. The kids love them as do I. It has several settings for each color or all colors. Timer 5-95 minutes. Rotates stars and moons on the ceiling and walls. Low light for falling asleep. Has plug in for wall outlet and can be used with batteries. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: KDsm

customer_reviews.title: Neat for a Kid's Room!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Our 3 month old son loves to stare at the stars and moon swirling around on his ceiling. It can keep him happy for at least 20-30 minutes (consider his age and take into consideration he's a "hold me" baby). My husband jokes he wants to steal it and put it in our room b/c it is really cool. I will; however, not let him haha.
customer_reviews.author: KC shops online

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks really cool in kids room on walls and ceiling as a night light. The rotating function broke after about 2 months. The quality is cheap and my son took it apart a few times, it’s a bit flimsy. The timer setting and button functions are a little confusing. But the effects and color variety is nice
customer_reviews.author: CDandEB

customer_reviews.title: Great! Wish it would have a permanent on option.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old and I love this light! It’s t much brighter and projects the stars better than I imagined. Only downfall is you can’t turn it on and stay on - it’s only on a timer. This has caused many middle of the night wake ups for our toddler asking for the light to be turned back on.
customer_reviews.author: K. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Star Projector
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter's room. She adores it. The colors are bright and the machine lights up her room. There are various settings for colors and length of time for it to project at night. It's really easy to figure out even without instructions, as my daughter figured out the settings all on her own. The only problem is that she now loves her stars so much she doesn't want to close her eyes and go to sleep! We've only had it for a week, so we can't speak to as to how durable it is, but it seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review After 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: Within 3 months, 3 of the four lights had burned out, the top cover (made of some really cheap plastic) comes off very easily, the power plug has a really rough time staying connected to the unit. While we loved it for the first couple of months, this thing is hardly worth $10, let alone the $25 they sell it for on here. Cheap quality, you should pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: Chidwick

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs burn out in months
customer_reviews.text: Great light while it work. My little boys loved this but the green bulb/fuse burnt out after 3 months, blue light at 6 months, and now at 8 months we only have a red light working. Super disappointed since there isn’t a way to replace the bulbs/fuses so just have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: ashnden

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector for my 2 year old. He is amazed by it. What I really love is the timer setting. We can set the timer in 5 minute increments for as long as we choose so it doesn’t stay on all night when we put him to bed. This product can use both battries or be plugged in. You can set to move, stay still and a wide variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Miracle

customer_reviews.title: DONT BOTHER.....
customer_reviews.text: after playing around with it for a while.. i had to go back and correct my review. this is just not bright at all... dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Grabowy

customer_reviews.title: stopped working in few weeks
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this light. I turned it on for about 10 minutes every night for about a month, then it quit working. First it started turning off right after I turned it on, then some of the color combinations quit working, finally none of the colors would come on, only the white lights, and now the rotation has quit working too.
customer_reviews.author: coldkitchen

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light to relax the kids or even adults for bed! For a clearer pattern take frosted cover off. Several color & pattern combo to choose from. Timer is great & if you don’t like the rotation you can have it still. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: BaBa

customer_reviews.title: Stars and moons
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this twice to put the babies to sleep and it definitely helped a lot. It’s nice and bright once you take the lid off. Lots of color and timer options. With the lid on it seems like it would be more of a night light with colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiko

customer_reviews.title: Timer is GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a different version that stopped rotating. This one seems sturdier and I like the timer option. I think that is why our other one wore out, it would stay on all day sometimes because son forgot to shut off. So the timer is a huge plus for us. I do wish we could go a little longer than 95 minutes, but it hasn't been an issue with our son. He loves his stars and loves having all the colors on at once.
customer_reviews.author: adorkbl

customer_reviews.title: Cute but needs better top
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! I think it’s really nice, stays on however long I set it and it rotates. The only thing I really don’t like about it, the top is very flimsy! Very thin plastic so if your kiddos play with it, it can easily be ripped. Not sure if I’d spend $23 on another one but the lights are nice if you don’t plan on moving it every night like I do.
customer_reviews.author: trent k

customer_reviews.title: You'll need one in each kid's room
customer_reviews.text: After I purchase the first one, my other kids wanted one as well! I now own two of these and will probably end up with a third! It is a very fun way to put the kids to bed as the stars rotate around the room in different colors variations of your choice. The kids love the dim nightlight effect with the fun stars overheard. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Worm

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: First we were clearly sent a used product, which normally i wouldn't care if not for the following: the screw to the battery cover was missing. The stars and moon were very fuzzy and blurry. When I took the cover off to look at it i noticed what you can see in the picture. The center (white) bulb is practically burnt out and the anodes and cathodes on the LED bulbs are all rusted and the rust is flaking off... I already threw the box away, and It does work good enough for my 18 month old daughter, so I will still use it until it dies and then buy a different one for sure
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift For The Cost
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a fun gadget.......I spent a few weeks with my toddler granddaughter who loved to read in my room at night and then watch the stars. She thought the “white” crescent moon looked like a banana, and we really had fun telling it to come back! I ended up buying her one to keep in her room....couldn’t bear to be without mine when I returned home.
customer_reviews.author: SAM in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids & awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this thing! It has many settings, so you can change it up often. I like the timer feature too. It comes in handy at bedtime. I was also happy about how quiet it is to while on rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome. What a cute little light that provides happiness all over the ceiling and walls. Just remember, this works best in a DARK room - it's gives you a great light show of stars and moons. I prefer all 4 colors on at the same time - and love the timer feature. It's plastic - not heavy and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This night lamp is just beautiful and just plain cool! We set it up in my daughters room without her knowing and when it was almost bedtime we turned it on and surprised her! It was a BIG hit! Thankfully it wasn't a school night and we stayed up looking at all the stars and sky! Pretty cool great for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.author: savinrd

customer_reviews.title: Good for calming baby to sleep...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my 1 yo nephew . First time buying this kind of lighting "toy" . When I turn it on , it is impressive how all the mixed lightings and patterns . It is beautiful and relaxing when you look at it . It had all the function of timer and how you want to mix the setting of lights . Highly recommended to anyone who has new born in the family !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calming lamp
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about this kind of products, too many options, I was almost confuse about what to buy. Found good reviews on this one and I gave it a try. I’m very pleased! Is tiny, and very light weight but it doesn’t demean it’s power in throwing some light! Even the little motor sound is kind of relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: We love this night light
customer_reviews.text: We love this night light. The only downfall is that there is no setting to let it stay on all night. When it turned off it would always wake my daughter up and she would get scared. Unfortunately we had to get a different type that stays on all night to replace this, but we love it so much we stuck in her bathroom during bath time. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: DFM

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and gentle light
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a quiet night, this light is exactly what I was seeking. I do have cathedral ceilings and the stars get blurry, but honestly I'm fine with that. The light would need to likely be so much more bright to make them crisp and I much prefer how gentle the lights are. The blue and green lights combined are soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Nika C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get duped like I did
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my niece who is 2. She’s been giving my sister trouble going to sleep. It arrived with a damaged box, instructions only in another language, no power adapter and the item is completely different from what is pictured here! This is a gift and it’s so disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids love their light globe. It has LED lights. The timer goes up to 99 minutes and had multiple colors to choose from or have them all. You can make the light spin or stay still. It has a battery and A/C adapter. Just an awesome buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Good for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this comes with so many options for timing, color and rotation. My 1.5 yo daughter loves it. She didnt want to go to bed because she wanted to keep playing with it. It also comes with a lid in the photo to keep it dim.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: The new item works very well and it looks very nice in my sons room
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I am updating my original review because they contacted me right away after I left my initial review, they took my concerns regarding my purchase very seriously and they replaced the item right away. The new item works very well and it looks very nice in my sons room. Thank you! I am so disappointed in this item. It is cheaply made, the plug that came with it does not work so I had to use my iPhone plug in to use so I do not have to use batteries. The lighting is terrible, not bright at all and that means that the pictures used in the description are very misleading. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: So far So good
customer_reviews.text: First night using it and it works fantastic. My daughter always had to fall asleep in our bed and we'd move her to hers after we were sure she was asleep. I'm happy to say she actually fell asleep in her room for the first time in awhile thanks to this! It's very relaxing to watch. Will be purchasing another for my sons room. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Burke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome night light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s room as a Christmas gift back in 2018. It worked really well, the motor from the rotating was a bit loud but it didn’t bother us much. It stopped rotating in December 2019 and I contacted the company to see if there was a way to troubleshoot it. They’ve sent us out a brand new one and it’s actually quieter than the one we had before. Great service!
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our new baby’s room but my 8 year daughter decided she needed it for her room instead. She loves it! Uses it every night. I’ve ordered similar products and they never turned out like I thought. This product is awesome and shines tons of stars all over the room and rotates and has different color settings. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Star Projection night light
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter just loves the stars. She says it is like a dark night when you can see all stars. She is only 5, but she does love it and it turns it self off.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. McQuarrie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I have been looking for a star projector for my son. I do wish it had the option to do sounds. (I was originally looking at sound machines ) but all of the sound machines with star projectors were not as awesome as this. The picture is awesome and I love that it moves. My son loves all the colors. The plastic feels slightly flimsy but as long as the kids don’t play with it it will be fine (wish us luck)
customer_reviews.author: E. Torg

customer_reviews.title: Dying after a week
customer_reviews.text: We’ve barely had it a week and when I set the timer to 15 mins, the light turns off and stops rotating before it even hits 10 mins. Maybe it’s defective? Or a bad bulb? The stars will light up and rotate for no longer than 5 mins regardless of the amount of time you set it for. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great option for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is remember what button does what. Buttons are labeled by letters which works for a kid, but maybe consider putting clearer labels on the base of machine. Currently you have to keep instructions to know what does what. Illumination is crisp and motorized component works well.
customer_reviews.author: Al

product_meta.title: Nursery Night Lights with Timer & Rotating, Star Projector Night Light for Kids, Projection Lamp/Kids Night Light for Bedroom - Sleep Helper - Christmas Gift for Kids Babies Girls Boys (Black)
feature_bullets: Best Gifts for Christmas/Birthday! -- Ideal gifts for your sweethearts, babies, kids, families and friends. Gift box package: 1 x LED Star Projector Night Light; 1 x Stars Projection Film; 1 x Translucent Milky White Lamp Cover; 1 x 59.1 inch USB Cable; 1 x Instruction Manual

[New upgrade version] -- Multicolor stars night light projector, can be used as sleep assistant or room decoration. 4 built-in new generations LED bulbs with 8 different color modes. Projector light can project up 15ft, 250 square feet of the house. Star projector night light's color modes: Warm light; Blue; Red, Green. And different combinations of four colors (eg: red-blue, blue-green, red-yellow blue, etc.)

Easy to Used -- The ON/OFF button on the back side of Nursery Night Lights. 4 control buttons [ A-- Timer setting (5-95 minutes); B-- Stationary or rotation control; C-- Projection modes customize; D-- Warm night-light]. Powered by 4 x AAA batteries (not included) or 5V USB cord ( 5ft USB cable included)

Multi-Function Projector Night Light -- Starry sky projection mode and night light mode. Create the ideal sleep environment for your child, also perfect for adults to attain a relaxing and calming effect. Baby night lights can be used as a nursery night light, holiday mood lamp, party/birthday/wedding/atmosphere lamp, table lamp, baby sleep soothers, also as an eye protection lamp when using a mobile phone or computer at night

ANTEQI Starry Light Projector -- Combined with Amazon's excellent delivery service, we provide a 16-month after-sale service, lifetime technical support. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions during the use of the star projector night light.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars2,059 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
